body.name: RliyOliy Kids Tablet, 7 inch Android 12 Tablet for Kids, 3GB RAM 32GB ROM Toddler Tablet with Bluetooth, WiFi, GMS, Parental Control, Dual Camera, Educational, Games(Green)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 49 mins
features: 【Android 12 & 3GB RAM 32GB ROM】 1024x600 IPS HD Touch Screen, Android 12 OS, 3GB RAM 32GB ROM, Support wifi, bluetooth, dual camera. you can expand the storage to 128 GB of SD cards for storing photos, music and videos with additional micro SD card extensions.(Appropriate Age Grade Over 3 years old kids)

【Pre-installed Kids App&Long Battery Life】 This tablet has passed the GMS certification, There are many kids free-learning apps pre-installed in our toddler tablet. You can also download many other apps like Youtube, Netflix, ZOOM, Disney+, ABCmouse etc, from kids store or Google play store. The upgraded battery can last more than 8.5 hours, suitable for long-distance flights or road trips.

【Kids Tablet With Adjustable Stand】 The baby tablet has two carrying handles and a back bracket of case allows toddlers to go hands-free for watching videos and video chatting with this toddler tablet. Free-hand while have pleasure, make happy double

【Parental Control Mode】 Kids Tablet with parental control mode, You can create and customize profiles for kids’ accounts, hand-pick content for your kids, control screen time, and ensure they are browsing safe websites. These security settings can be adjusted as kids grow with content tailored to their age and It has password control, remote video control, one-button lock screen and Learning, art, smart games

【5-year Warranty】Our kids tablet offers a 5-year warranty and Lifetime customer service, we will answer your any questions within 24 hours. Package includes：1 x Tablet PC, 1 x Protective Silicone Case, 1 x screen protector ,1 x Data Cable, 1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much better than the Amazon Kindlefire Kids!!!
reviews.reviewText: We previously had an Amazon Kindle fire kids tablet and I hated it. It was so slow. Well my 2 year old spilled a drink on it and it fried it. I was bummed but swore I wasn't going to buy another Amazon tablet. So I bought this one instead, I was worried because the price point seemed too good to be true but it's AMAZING! super fast processing, and operates on Android OS. comes with a screen protector and a tough case. Battery life is great! Buy this now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great starter tablet for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: I bought this tablet for my niece who just turned 4, wanted to get her her own tablet to play on rather than always borrowing mom's.It comes with a lot of apps preinstalled for kids to play with, including a drawing app, videos, educational games and so on. There are parental controls as well which I consider essential and easy to set up, but you can ignore them if you don't care about them. Best of all, it loads up and performs quite fast, which is great for a hyperactive kid who wants to zoom from one activity to the next. It kept up with her taps and clicks just fine, never lagged once. I also think the soft and squishy case is great for kids who are prone to dropping things.Overall an excellent tablet for kids!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two tablets. One has factory reset on me 3 times. My child only got to play with it once before it reset again and I refuse to set this tablet up for a 4th time.I bought it for around $50 as a Christmas gift. It takes over an hour to fully set up. Which is fine.. if you only have to do it once. Mind you the resets happened in ONE WEEK. I set it up 2 days before Xmas morning. Turned it on Xmas morning after it was wrapped and it was back to set up. So I did it again on Xmas day. Let the boy play then 2 days later I went to give him the tablet after it was completely fine, shut down and put away to charge. It worked just fine when I last touched it. So idk what’s causing the issue.. I just know that this product is a big waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great security and durable quality.
reviews.reviewText: I love the security and child guidance options on this tablet. Great learning app included. Easy for my grandchild to carry around Nice as it has option for a carry strap. Strap wasn't included however. But not a huge cost for the convenience. The perfect size for lil ones and battery holds out pretty good. And it recharges fast . Nice addition for learning advancements.and still has all the standard tablet options as well. Awesome lil product!! The case is perfect for lil accidents it keep it protected very well.l love it !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: This tablet has been a life saver for us traveling in the car. We have 5 different movies download onto it for our 2 year old to watch and it has made a world of a difference in the car or at a restraint! There’s also fun game preloaded onto the tablet which even I had fun trying out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The iwawa app is great!
reviews.reviewText: I guess that i misunderstood about the set up of it. Within the iwawa app you have kid profiles and tons of preloaded games but I thought I would be able to log out of the parent profile of the whole tablet. If you can I haven't figured it out yet. Only complaint I have is google wouldn't allow me to make my child an account. I put her name and it told me that it couldn't create one..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My niece loves it
reviews.reviewText: My niece loves her tablet, every times she comes to my house that is the first thing she asked for. Only thing I can say that is wrong with it, is that the tablet goes dead too quickly but I think it more on my niece. She keeps it on all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very cheaply made. Like cheaper than the price tag made. I bought cause it was rated in the top 10 and it sucks. Touch lags. Very poor image quality. Should have suspected because it’s powered by android.
